caseTitle: Muhammad Faisal Abbas v. The State
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: Occurrence took place inside the shop impact whereof though grievously devastating for the witnesses, however, cannot be said to have spilled over to the public at large. Therefore, in the peculiar facts and circumstances of the case, appellant’s conviction under Section 7 of Anti Terrorism Act, 1997, is not sustainable and set aside accordingly.
